uk.gov.gchq.palisade.policy.service.request

Class SetPolicyRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.service.request.Request
      • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.policy.service.request.SetPolicyRequest

  • public class SetPolicyRequest
extends Request
    This class is used in the request to set a Policy for a Resource. That resource may be signifying a file, stream, directory or the system (policy is applied to all requests to the Palisade system).
